params._collateralToken: Address of the collateral token (e.g., USDC)
params._oracle: Address authorized to resolve the market (address(0) uses default)
params._question: The market question (e.g., "Will GHS/USD exceed 15.0 by Dec 31, 2024?")
params._resolutionTimestamp: When the market can be resolved

returns.noToken: Address of the NO outcome token
returns.yesToken: Address of the YES outcome token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_RESOLUTION_TIME().notice: Maximum resolution time (in seconds from creation)

MIN_RESOLUTION_TIME().notice: Minimum resolution time (in seconds from creation)

getMarketsCount().notice: Get the total number of markets created

getResolvableMarkets().notice: Get markets that are ready to resolve

isValidMarket(address).notice: Mapping to check if an address is a valid market

marketIndex(address).notice: Mapping from market address to market index

updateDefaultOracle(address).notice: Update the default oracle address (only owner)
